data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Magdalena, Colombia. Please, stir the 153,137 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Magdalena, Colombia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Magdalena, Colombia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 153,137 believers in Magdalena to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Magdalena.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, 1.6% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, guide the church in Magdalena, Colombia to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Magdalena, Colombia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Magdalena, Colombia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Magdalena
location.cities_list: Santa Marta, Ciénaga, Fundación, El Banco, Pivijay
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Marta (431,781), Ciénaga (88,311), Fundación (59,175), El Banco (54,522), Pivijay (33,492)
